name: NO ESCAPE (itch) (polilox)
description:
In our game NO ESCAPE you play as Omar, a young man in his early 20s, full of joy or at least used to be until the death of his mother that turned his life into constant misery and suffering, but that one night was special...

Omar came back home and found no way of escaping his miserable reality other than sleeping instead of ending his own life .

A dimensional demon who takes people in great pain as vessels shows up when Omar is asleep and tries to take over his body and manipulate his dreams .

Now Omar has to escape all the mind traps set in his dreams and get back to reality before the demon completely takes over his body.
